name: Device
description: Entry containing attributes about a device

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: Human readable name of the device, suitable for displaying to end-users. For example, 'BLE Heart Monitor' etc.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: A mutable boolean value indicating the device administrative status. If set TRUE, the commands (such as connect, disconnect, subscribe) that control app sends to the controller for the devices will be processeed by the controller. If set FALSE, any command comming from the control app for the device will be rejected by the controller.

attributes.name: mudUrl
attributes.description: A URL to MUD file of the device (RFC 8520).

attributes.name: groups
attributes.description: A list of groups to which the device belongs, either through direct membership, through nested groups, or dynamically calculated.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the Device's group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Group' resource to which the user belongs.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'direct' or 'indirect'.
